alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:49AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Price County through 215 AM CDT... At 148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Auburn, to near Lake Hallie, to near Altoona, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and half inch hail. The storms have a history of producing wind damage and it`s possible a Severe Thunderstorm Warning may be needed for damaging winds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Catawba and Kennan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.
